comment: Here I am . Still standing . Fierce with the reality of love & loss . Wearing truth of our hearts on our tattered sleeves . And yes , there were days when the darkness was heavy & the climb out of that rabbit hole required us to mine our depths for strength we didn't even know we had

comment: But here we are . Broken open by hope . Cracked wide by loss . Full of longing and grief and the burn of that phoenix fire . Warriors painted with ashes . Embers from the blaze still clinging to our newborn skin . Leaving us marked with scars rebirth . And just look at us
